title: Richard Dawkins and the End of the World May 21
post:
Lazy finger pointing. Very very different cases at hand here. 
For one thing: “countless sums of money”. Really? That would be a bona fide miracle. 
For another thing: one ad says “probably” and the other “the bible guarantees it”. 
Apples and oranges.
author: Tim

title: Richard Dawkins and the End of the World May 21
post: Your attempt at ridiculing both parties here has failed. Epicly. Use a comb with finer teeth next time.
author: John

title: Richard Dawkins and the End of the World May 21
post: This is pathetic. Dawkins’ bus campaign hasn’t been demonstrably proven to be untrue. In my opinion, that is because it is true, there is no god, but that is beside te point. The point is that on one hand, Dawkins’ campaign is not unproven, and cost a few quid to stick posters on the side of buses in London. On the other hand, this cult spend hundreds of thousands on a worldwide advertisement campaign.
author: Craig
